text: What are you doing, darling? Hands off, please~~
Oh my! Mouse...mouse in the wrong place!
What's your intention, love?
Meow meow meow?
Scaredy-cat here(ノ≧∇≦)ノ
Inappropriate! Help!
If this continues, I might have to resort to my claws!
I'm getting a bit cross, you know.
No touchy-feely, please!
Really... you're quite shameless!
Pervert!
It was... it was an accident, right?
What's a 'lolicon', dear?
Have you seen my little teddy bear?
If you keep touching, I'll have to call the constable! ⌇●﹏●⌇
Is this 999? There's a strange person here who won't stop touching me (ó﹏ò｡)
Stop touching me, or I'll tell my lady friend to give you a thrashing!
Why are you touching me! Be careful, I might bite!
Don't touch me, there's nothing to feel here!

seasons.text: New Year's Day is here, a new year has begun, this year is {year}~
It's Valentine's Day again, have you found a partner in {year}~
Today is Tree Planting Day, we must protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret~Today is April Fool's Day, don't be fooled~
Today is Labour Day, have you planned where to go for the holiday~
It's Children's Day, it would be nice if we never grew up…
Teacher's Day, remember to greet your teachers at school~
National Day is here, let's celebrate for our motherland!
Who did you spend this year's Double Eleven with~
These are the days of Christmas, I bet you're going shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! The early bird catches the worm, a beautiful day begins~
Good morning! How's work going, don't sit for too long, get up and move around!
It's noon, you've worked all morning, now it's lunch time!
It's easy to get sleepy in the afternoon, have you met your exercise goals today?
It's evening! The sunset outside the window is very beautiful, the most beautiful is the sunset~
Good evening, how was your day?

text: It's already so late, go to bed early, good night~
Take care of your eyes in the late night!

time.text: Are you a night owl? It's so late and you're still not sleeping, can you get up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, how swiftly the days fly by...
You big meanie! How long has it been since you've paid me any attention, whimper whimper~
I'm going to pound you with my little fists!
Remember to add our little home to your favorites!
